attributes.action: URGENTLY ARRANGE TO PAY FARMERS THEIR OUTSTANDING SUBSIDIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE IN ENGLAND HAVE BECOME THE FALL GUYS OF EUROPE.THE PRIME MINISTER HAS GIVEN UP 40% OF OUR MONEY TO EUROPE. HE HAS GIVEN BACK THE GREEN POUND. HOW DARE HE ALLOW BONUS TO BE PAID TO THE STAFF OF RPA AND DEFRA WHEN 25,000 FARMERS HAVE NOT YET RECEIVED THEIR 2005 SUBSIDY. THE 2006 SUBSIDIES CANNOT BE PAID IN FULL BECAUSE THE MONEY HAS RUN OUT, GORDON BROWN MUST BE PETITIONED TO PUT IN THE £50MILLION POUNDS REQUIRED TO STOP FURTHER SUICIDES AND HEALTH PROBLEMS CAUSED BY THE STRESS OF FARMERS HAVING TO KEEP GOING BACK TO THEIR BANKS FOR MORE AND MORE LOANS UNTIL THEY RECEIVE THEIR MONEY AS THE REST OF EUROPE AND THE REST OF BRITAIN HAS RECEIVED.
